message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1400000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1300000. I believe this is a reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to compromise and offer the product to you for $1380000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than I'd like to go. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1280000. Is this something we can work with?

I understand your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob, but I'm still not ready to give up on a better deal. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer the product to you for $1320000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a good value for you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $1320000. I'm willing to meet you at $1290000. Is this a price you're comfortable with?

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go above $1320000. I'm willing to make one final compromise and offer the product to you for $1310000. This is the absolute highest I'm willing to go, and I'm hoping you can meet me at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not willing to go above $1310000. I'm willing to meet you at $1290000. Is this a price you're comfortable with?
